docs.snippet: Last week's foreign exchange market was dull, business being small and price changes unimportant. In the case of the free pound each passing day will witness greater contraction in that currency as the market edges to its complete elimination....
docs.lead_paragraph: Last week's foreign exchange market was dull, business being small and price changes unimportant. In the case of the free pound each passing day will witness greater contraction in that currency as the market edges to its complete elimination. Presently the value of the free pound is slightly more than ten cents under the official rates set by the British.

headline.main: SHIPPING AND MAILS; DATA ON SHIPS OF NATIONS AT WAR SHOULD BE SOUGHT FROM THE LINES.

docs.snippet: The American Republics liner Argentina arrived here yesterday from the east coast of South America with 412 passengers, the largest number she has carried on any trip this year.
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Republics liner Argentina arrived here yesterday from the east coast of South America with 412 passengers, the largest number she has carried on any trip this year.

docs.snippet: HYDE PARK, N.Y., Aug. 6-- Four chiefs of delegations to the recent Pan-American conference at Havana were entertained at luncheon today by President and Mrs. Roosevelt.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor La Guardia yesterday told members of six Latin-American delegations to the recent Havana conference that North and South America must work together to translate into action the policies formed in Havana, and that the United States must back Pan America with a "sufficient force...
